About Me

Here's a few things about me...

BIO

Hello!

My name is Mike, and I'm a Software Engineer. I'm always looking forward to working on meaningful projects.

I currently live in Indianapolis, and I try to code as often as possible. My strongest language at this time is Python, but I also enjoy working with JavaScript. I think Django and React are pretty swell too.

Besides programming, my hobbies include learning human languages, brushing up on math, and studying finance.
